vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συναθλέω,
={συναγωνίζομαι},{τινι} with one, [NT]; struggle together, τινι for a thing, [Refs]
__II impress by practice upon, μεταφορᾶς μνήμῃ συνηθλημένης [Refs 1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to contend at one’s side, together
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to contend at one’s side, together
primarily to fight or work on the side of, labour with any one; in NT to cooperate vigorously with a person, Phil. 4:3; to make effort in the cause of, in support of a thing, Phil. 1:27*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: pelear junto con, trabajar junto con
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: để cố gắng với; chung nhau chiến đấu cho; đồng lòng cùng chiến đấu. σύν (G4862) + ἀθλέω (G118)
